entry.title: Oh, What a Predicament
entry.summary:
Author: MidnightSnow_22

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,612Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 6

Summary: “Do you want Robin to be a boy for the sake of continuity? Or…”He stops, closing his eyes, inhaling, then exhaling, opening his eyes again to look at Tim.“Or… because you are more comfortable being a boy?”Bruce was hard to read; he always had been.But over the last 5 months, he had come to learn the subtle differences between his grunts, his silences, his looks, and expressions.Bruce looked at him in a way that was a mix of when he made conclusions without much evidence and knew it, and when he was disappointed.It took an exceptionally long time for Tim to figure out the difference between when Bruce was disappointed in Tim, or himself.He was disappointed in himself.And Tims silence spoke volume.“What’s your name?”—————————————When Bruce finally brings up the topic of what Tims Robin suit will look like, Tim is excited beyond describable words. Bruce struggles to remind the young girl he had been training that Robin can be a girl, and that Robin can be a female hero as well.Or; Tim comes out to BruceThis is the first Fic I’m ever uploading to Ao3!! Yay!

entry.title: Violet Birds in Emerald Skies
entry.summary:
Author: Niveara

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,058Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 494

Summary: Hal.exe stopped working. This child, this Sparrow, was THE Sparrow? Like the Champion of Predator, Wielder of Violet Light, Paragon of Love, Sparrow? The Star Sapphire with ‘rings for eyes’ that Kilowog, Green Lantern 1-9-8-6, was always going on and on about? The individual Carol, Star Sapphire 1-9-6-2, was always saying was a 'stain’ against the Zamaron’s Star Sapphires Corps?But they were just an itty bitty little baby.“You’re joking right” he teased assuming this was just Sinestro trying his hand at humor “please tell me your joking. Surely a 6 year old human child isn’t THE Sparrow”“You are correct” Sinestro agreed flatly a small smile forming upon his face as Hal relaxed at his response “a 6 year old human child is not THE Sparrow”“Oh thank-“ Hal started only to get cut off as Sinestro finished his thoughts.“It is my understanding that the child is only 4 and a half”ORTim Drake becomes a Star Sapphire shortly after watching the Flying Graysons fall. This has consequences.

Summary: Tim snorts, “Right. Obviously, that’s not the full story, but you were in space so we’re good.” He activates the tablet and shows Hal familiar paperwork. “I’ve come to the conclusion that if the League is going to treat me like I’m an unstable rogue, they’re going to have to commit to the bit.”After being treated like unwanted children all their lives, Tim, Kon, Cassie, and Bart start to realise that the adulthood set out before them isn't much better than the past their leaving behind. entry.title: Sour Candies and Pink Tulips
entry.summary:
Author: flavourless_fiction

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,677Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 56

Summary: All the details were the same as last time: the plush bedding, the crystal bowl filled with individually wrapped sour candies that would turn his mouth blue or green, even the vase of pink tulips. It only ever took Tim taking a shred of positive interest in something, and it would show up in the hotel room whenever his attention was wanted. He was sure that if he checked the minibar, it would be stocked with his favourite drinks.He knew he couldn’t complain, the gestures were supposed to be something nice, confirmation that Jason valued him for more than just his services. He could do a lot worse than one of Senator Wayne’s sons as a patron, could do a lot worse than a decent guy like Jason, who wanted company just as much as he wanted sex.After Janet Drake's death life went from bad to worse for the Drake family, Tim eventually finds a way to make some stable money, he just didn't expect the cost to be his own feelings.JayTim Week 2025 Day 7 - Red ~ Love

entry.title: the white threads of fate
entry.summary:
Author: remi_wolf

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,287Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 27

Summary: Four years ago, Jason Todd was little more than a feral creature hell-bent on vengeance. After making a series of ridiculously horrifying decisions, he's left Gotham behind, left behind the few people he'd call family, and ended up striking out on his own. After creating a small team with Roy Harper and Koriand'r, Jason's managed to cobble together a good life. He still rights wrongs, and does heroic things, just...with a bit more of a violent edge than most. Unfortunately, one of these jobs forces him to return back to Gotham, despite all of the risks. He just has to go to a gala, though, and avoid the Bats.What he hadn't expected was just how one of the Bats had grown up, and just how beautiful they looked at the white tie gala the undercover mission he was on led him to.JayTim Week 2025 Day Four: Free Day (White)

entry.title: the unforgiving minute
entry.summary:
Author: orphicgaze

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,122Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 119

Summary: Bart squirms on the couch, legs kicking out against the armrest, pillow tucked into his stomach, the not-pain discomfort refusing to go away. "Periods suck." He gnaws on the edge of the pillow as the room goes silent. "Bart," Robin starts, almost painfully slow. It's the 'Grife-Bart-what'd-you-do' voice, but it's not like he's done anything. Today, anyway. "You don't have those." Bart scoffs, pulling his mouth away from the attack on the fabric. "Not before, but I do now. Remember?" Several months before, Young Justice crossed paths with a supervillain with a particular set of skills. Bart was hit, changed permanently, and moved on with his life pretty quickly.Somehow, no one's noticed. Until now, that is.(Bartholomew Henry Allen the II does not understand why it's such a big deal what's inside his pants. This century, he concludes, is so weird.)
